text:
[Verse]
Golden sky above us
Colors in the air
Chasing light till it's dusk
Moments we all share

[Verse 2]
Walking on the shoreline
Footprints in the sand
Fingers intertwined now
Lost in this dreamland

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams come alive
Hearts are soaring high
Together we survive
Underneath the sky

[Verse 3]
Waves they crash so gently
Whisper in my ear
Close your eyes and feel free
Nothing left to fear

[Bridge]
Stars will start to twinkle
Moon will light the way
In this special moment
We will never stray

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams come alive
Hearts are soaring high
Together we survive
Underneath the sky
title: Sunset Dreams
